title: Stuff4Office Premium Whiteboard Spray Surface Cleaner - 250ml Bottle - Cleans and Restores - Suitable for Home, School and Office Use (1)
features: EASY TO USE : Our spray cleaner is easy to use and comes in a convenient 250ml bottle, making it perfect for use in your home, office, or classroom
SAFE FOR SURFACES: Our formula is safe for all types of whiteboards and won't damage the surface, so you can use it with confidence.
FAST DRYING: Our spray cleaner dries quickly, so you can start writing on your whiteboard again in no time.
description: Product Description Keep Your Whiteboard Looking Like New SIZE:250ml bottle SPECIALLY FORMULATED: to clean, protect and condition all types of whiteboards SAFE FOR SURFASES: Our formula is safe for all types of whiteboards and won't damage the surface, so you can use it with confidence. EASY TO USE : Our spray cleaner is easy to use and comes in a convenient 250ml bottle, making it perfect for use in your home, office, or classroom. FAST DRYING: Our spray cleaner dries quickly, so you can start writing on your whiteboard again in no time. Are you tired of struggling to clean your whiteboard with regular cleaners that leave behind smudges and streaks? Our Premium White Board Spray Cleaner is the perfect solution to keep your whiteboard sparkling clean and ready for use. Our specially formulated cleaner removes stubborn stains and ghosting with ease, leaving your whiteboard looking like new. It's gentle on the surface of your whiteboard, preventing damage and ensuring that your board lasts for years to come. Our 250ml bottle is the perfect size for home and office use, and our easy-to-use spray nozzle makes it simple to apply the cleaner to your whiteboard. The compact size also makes it easy to store and transport, so you can take it with you wherever you go. Perfect For All Environments Stuff4Office White board spray cleaner fluid is suitable for a variety of environments such as : offices for collaborative working Kitchens Noticeboards, Sales targets Schools And much more. Education Industry Having A clean, clear whiteboard makes it easier to read what has been written, ensuring that important ideas and information are communicated effectively. Which is imperative to have in a classroom in Nursery, schools, colleges and universities. How to Use Shake the bottle well before use. Spray the cleaner onto the whiteboard surface. Use a soft cloth or paper towel to wipe the surface clean. For tough stains, allow the cleaner to sit for a few minutes before wiping Benefits Of Using Stuff4office White Board Cleaner Spray IMPROVED CLARITY: A clean whiteboard makes it easier to read what has been written, ensuring that important ideas are communicated effectively. INCREASED VISABILITY: Removing old ink residue and stains makes the whiteboard more visible, which helps keep the attention of the people using it and allows them to focus on the content being presented. EXTENDED LIFESPAN: Regular cleaning of a whiteboard can extend its lifespan, meaning you won't have to replace it as often, which can save you money in the long run. PROFESIONAL EXPEREINCE: A clean whiteboard makes a good impression and shows that you take your work and your tools seriously. This is especially important when presenting to clients or colleagues. MAINTAINING HYGEINE: Regular cleaning of your whiteboard ensures that the surface is free from germs and bacteria, which can accumulate over time, especially in high-traffic areas. This helps maintain a hygienic work environment, which is crucial for health and safety. At Stuff4Office we are committed to providing our customers with high-quality products and exceptional service. Our 250ml white board cleaner spray is no exception. We use only the best ingredients and manufacturing processes to ensure that our white board spray is effective, safe, and long-lasting. Plus, with our easy-to-use compact spray design, you can quickly and easily clean on the go!
